meaningMnemonic: If you come across a <kanji>matter</kanji> in which the <kanji>rule</kanji>s aren’t clear, you’ll need to have a look in an <vocabulary>encyclopedia</vocabulary>!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
